DOC.brief_summary: Pulse oximetry standard non-invasive method measure blood oxygen saturation ( SpO2 ) . In develop country , pulse oximeter rare expense electricity requirement . Our ECEM group develop Phone Oximeter , use cell phone ( widely available develop country ) compute analyze information pulse oximeter sensor . To reduce cost , develop oximeter sensor ( AudioOx ) plug audio jack standard cell phone . This study aim calibrate AudioOx expose 30 healthy adult volunteer various altitude UBC 's hypoxia chamber .
DOC.brief_title: Calibration Evaluation Audio Pulse Oximeter Sensor ( AudioOx ) Ascent Descent From Simulated Altitude
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : We Electrical Computer Engineering Medicine Group ( ECEM ) University British Columbia , Vancouver , Canada , plan make pulse oximetry available resource poor country design low-cost , battery-powered pulse oximeter device consist low-cost pulse oximeter sensor connect cell phone . The use cell phone patient monitor appeal widely available many develop country . Utilizing battery power , cell phone rely continuous source electricity . This essential , low-resource setting lack adequate infrastructure thus provide uninterrupted power supply required conventional patient monitoring . Furthermore , cell phone efficiency , integrate display , process power require analyze store raw data derive pulse oximeter sensor . Data pulse oximeter transmit referral center diagnostic advisory purpose cellular networking service permit . Proprietary oximeter sensor module expensive . To reduce cost , propose develop simple audio pulse oximeter sensor ( AudioOx ) require sensor module interface via audio jack standard cell phone . By utilize audio jack transmission data sensor phone , ensure cell phone type common various area world universally support . Preliminary laboratory test show oximetry data AudioOx sufficient signal strength resolution extraction heart rate SpO2 . Hypothesis : We hypothesize study allow u successfully calibrate AudioOx . Justification : Development pulse oximeter require calibration evaluation accuracy . There acceptable surrogate calibration tool pulse oximeter . To quote current International Organization Standardization ( ISO ) Pulse Oximetry standard document : `` There today accept method verify correct calibration pulse oximeter probe/pulse oximeter monitor combination test human being . This due complexity optical intricacy interaction light human tissue upon pulse oximetry depend '' . A previous calibration study perform volunteer concurrent study UBC hypoxia chamber . The result demonstrate AudioOx calibrate within 4 % accuracy require ISO . The study setup , however , suboptimal measure SpO2 data predominantly hypoxic . Motion artifacts also abundant , subject unrestricted movement . Objectives : Our main objective improve calibration AudioOx : - Asking subject remain relatively immobile data measurement . - Exposing subject gradual change oxygen concentration measurement distribute entire clinical range SpO2 ( 70 % 100 % ) . - Using two ( instead one ) clinically-approved pulse oximeter different manufacturer secondary reference standard . Our secondary objective evaluate compare performance AudioOx motion , low perfusion , rapidly change SpO2 : - Asking subject perform standardized hand finger motion data measurement . - Simulating low perfusion via two method : partially occlude brachial artery use blood pressure cuff patient raise arm two minute use light filter reduce red infra-red signal detect pulse oximeter sensor . - Measuring SpO2 subject enters exit hypoxia chamber . Research Method : This non-invasive concurrent observational study healthy voluntary adult subject normobaric ( sea-level atmospheric pressure ) hypoxia ( low oxygen ) chamber . Study subject put hypoxic state expose normobaric hypoxia administrate air mix contain reduce O2 concentration . This achieve hypoxia chamber O2 concentration gradually reduce simulate high altitude ( 4500 ) . The goal current study similar another study conduct hypoxia chamber ( REB ID # H12-02362 , The Camera Oximeter ) , methodology apply . This allow recruiting subject study reduce total number subject necessary achieve goal . Statistical Analysis : Calibration SpO2 Data initial set subject ( least 10 ) study use calibrate AudioOx oximetry data . Firstly , ratio R calculate red infra-red ( IR ) photo-absorbance signal , R = ( ACRED / DCRED ) / ( ACIR / DCIR ) ACRED ACIR pulsatile component red infra-red light detect oximeter photosensor . DCRED DCIR constant component red infra-red light detect oximeter photosensor . R value pair reference SpO2 value ( average two reading two reference pulse oximeter ) plot scatter plot . Depending shape plot , R value translate SpO2 value use linear equation , multiple linear equation , polynomial equation . Evaluation Accuracy Readings oximeter sensor group six range ( 70-75 % , 76-80 % , 81-85 % , 86-90 % , 91-95 % 96-100 % ) . For range SpO2 overall range ( 70-100 % ) accuracy calculate per ISO definition : Accuracy pulse oximeter shall state term root-mean-square ( rms ) difference AudioOx value ( SpO2i ) reference value ( SRi ) , give : Arms = √ ( ( ∑i=1 n ( SpO2i- SRi ) ^2 ) /n ) To express Accuracy relative `` gold-standard '' blood gas analysis , error secondary standard pulse oximeter ( errorref ) include : Accuracy = √ ( Arms^2 + error ( ref ) ^2 ) Motion & low perfusion quantify proportion time test measurement either give reading 4 % different correspond control measurement .
DOC.criteria: Nonsmokers UBC student age 18 old nonuniversity student age 19 old No medical history respiratory , cardiovascular neurological problem ( capable undergoing control hypoxemia SpO2 70 % ) .
